titleStmt.title: World Wide Diplomatic Archives Index: Sao Tome and Principe
Sao Tome and Principe

div.head: Legislation
div.p: There is no official legislation regarding the access to diplomatic records.

div.head: Location
div.p: Historical Archive: Av. Marginal 12 de Julho, SAO TOME, SAO TOME E PRINCIPE PO Box: Caixa Postal 87.

div.head: Procedures
div.p: Researchers should contact the Historical Archive, the Cabinet for Public and International Relations of the National Assembly or the nearest Sao Tome and Principe embassy or UN delegation to make inquiries.
